boardgame.name: Container: 10th Anniversary Jumbo Edition!
Контейнер: Полное юбилейное издание
boardgame.description: Container, the classic game of big ships and big production, returns in a 10th Anniversary Jumbo Edition! Now with huge ships and realistic containers to load and unload, building (or destroying) your living economy has never been more fun!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Container is an easy game with an open economy and lots of meaningful decisions. Build factories and warehouses, or focus on shipping goods to your island. Take advantage of government subsidies to ensure maximum profits! But watch out for your cash reserves because the player-driven market can go sour at any time, and you'll need to be ready to change your strategy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Also included in this edition of Container is an all new add-on called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Investment Bank_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. This new entity operates as a game-controlled broker who is seeking to maximize their own profits. Watch as the three brokers try to build their own cash and container resources and be ready to make a deal when the price is right. The Investment Bank add-on ensures new and interesting challenges for even the most seasoned Container player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This 10th Anniversary Jumbo Edition of Container features resin miniature ships 7 inches long!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Container: 10th Anniversary Jumbo Edition! – 15 Extra Containers
Container: 10th Anniversary Jumbo Edition! – Container Harbour

Episode 35 - Gen Con 2018 Preview Hootin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; And Hollerin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;
Episode 56 :: The Climbers Review + 2017 Gen Con Preview
Episode 79 :: Pioneer Days Review + 2018 Gen Con Recap

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Thanks to buyers remorse, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m trying to sell my preorder of Container Jumbo Edition! You can still preorder this game (as of the time of my posting) for $85, but my offer will save somebody $15. Shipping should be about $12 (US addresses only, please). Given that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m just selling my preorder, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m asking for payment that doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t incur a fee such as Venmo or Paypal Send Money to Friends or Amazon.com gift card. Thanks!!

[COLOR=#FF0000][size=18]THIS LISTING IS [b]NOT[/b] FOR THE ACTUAL GAME![/size][/COLOR] This listing is for a 3D-printed card _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;container_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to hold all the cards included with the Container: 10th Anniversary Jumbo Edition game. This will fit inside the box as shown in the images below. Item was printed using gray [url=https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X8BQYPS/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o02_s00?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;psc=1]PLA filament infused with iron filings[/url], .175 mm layer height, and 24% infill. (~20 hr. print time) The filament is able to attract magnets, and it can be _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;rusted_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for a more authentic container aesthetic. Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s some [url=https://www.proto-pasta.com/blogs/how-to/17590348-improved-rusting-method-for-iron-prints]tips on how to achieve a rusted look with this filament[/url]. This is NOT a professionally printed object, but it is a very high quality print. Please see detailed images below before bidding. [imageid=4232234 inline] [imageid=4232235 inline] [imageid=4232236 inline] [imageid=4232237 inline] [imageid=4232238 inline]
